description:
[h1]We have fixed the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2157793059]Sniper Spudgun mod[/url]![/h1]
[b]Thanks to [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2816900681]Questionable Mark's Modded Craftbot Recipes[/url], the gun is obtainable at the Trader in survival![/b]

[h1]Features:[/h1]
[list]
    [*][b]Faster Potato projectile[/b]
    [*][b]More damage[/b]
    [*][b]Slower reload time[/b]
    [*][b]Zoomig in/out while scoped in with Q/R[/b]
[/list]

[h1]Credits:[/h1]
[list]
    [*][b]TheGuy920[/b] - scripting
    [*][b]diana[/b] - scripting
    [*][b]Fawx [/b] - models
    [*][b]Vajdani [/b] - updating UI, porting
    [*][b]MrCrackx02[/b] - fixing broken models
[/list]



Have fun sniping bots with [i]SSStyle[/i]!
name: Fixed Sniper Spudgun
